Real signs. Real people. Niagara built. Vinyl Wall Decal – Discover the best vinyl wall decal in 2025! Vinyl Wall Decal now available. Charming Winnie the Pooh & Friends Wall Decal for KidsBring the magic of Disney to your child's nursery, bedroom, or playroom with this delightful Winnie the Pooh & Friends vinyl wall decal. Featuring beloved characters Pooh, Tigger, and Eeyore, this premium quality decal transforms any space into a storybook wonderland.Why You'll Love It: Vibrant Disney Artwork: High-resolution printing captures every detail for a cheerful and playful look. Easy Application: Just peel and stick! Adheres smoothly to walls, furniture, and any clean, flat surface. Removable & Residue-Free: Change your decor anytime—simply remove without damaging walls or leaving sticky residue. Durable & Weatherproof: Crafted from Oracal 651 vinyl for 5+ years of brilliant color, indoors or out. Available Sizes Small: 6" x 6" (15.2 cm) Medium: 9" x 9" (22.9 cm) Large: 12" x 12" (30.5 cm) X-Large: 15" x 15" (38.1 cm) Perfect For Nursery and kids' room wall decor Baby shower or birthday gifts Daycare centers and playrooms Disney-themed spaces for little ones Transform your child’s room with timeless Disney joy—choose your perfect size and delight their imagination today!
